body.name: Outdoor Surveillance IP Camera, 1080P HD Wireless Home Security Camera, with Infrared Night Vision, Motion Detection, Spotlight, Pet Camera, Baby Monitor
features: CRISP HD VIDEO: Experience crystal-clear 1080P HD video and sound with our top-of-the-line outdoor camera. See and hear everything happening in and around your home, day or night

REAL-TIME SOUND: With advanced sound processing capabilities, our camera provides seamless audio and video output without any lag. The built-in pickup processor ensures high clarity and super low noise for a clearer and more immersive surveillance experience.

ENHANCED NIGHT VISION: Our camera features infrared LED technology for exceptional low light performance. It effortlessly switches between day and night modes and activates infrared when the lighting conditions are too dim, ensuring continuous delivery of clear images even in the dark.

EASY INSTALLATION: Set up a reliable security system for your home effortlessly with our Outdoor HD Infrared Camera. Simply mount the waterproof camera in your desired location and connect it to your existing network for hassle-free checking.

VERSATILE SURVEILLANCE SOLUTION: Our camera is not only capable of providing high-grade images but also serves as a comprehensive surveillance solution for various needs. From home and baby checking to property and street surveillance, it is designed to meet all your security requirements.
body.description: Spec:Item Type: Outdoor Infrared CameraMaterial: ABSImage Sensor: 1/3 inch Megapixel CMOSEffective Pixels: 1920(H) x 1080(V)Lens Focal Length: 16mmPixels: 2MPMinimum Illumination: 0.1 LX/F1.2 (Color), 0 LX (Black and White, IR ON)Video Standard: HDCVI and CVBSDay/Night Mode: LCR dual filter switchVideo Frame Rate: 1920x1080P at.25FPSMaximum Transmission Distance: Up to 500M using twisted pair or 75-3 video cableSignal to Noise Ratio: >52dBBacklight Compensation: ON or OFFSynchronization System: Internal synchronizationWhite Balance: AutoVideo Output: 1 x HDCVI HD BNC outputInput Power: DC12VPower Consumption: Less than 2WOperating Temperature: -10°C to 50°COperating Humidity: Less than 85%packing list:1 x Camera3 x Waterproof Cover Connector Accessories1 x Washer
